resources.string: Bring meaning to your metrics and stories to your dates with our app of interesting number facts.
Have a beautiful day for you
This function will allow you to find out a fact about any <font color="#FF0000">mathematical number.</font>
This function will allow you to find out a fact about <font color="#FF0000">anything.</font>
This function will allow you to find out a fact about any <font color="#FF0000">date.</font>
April 30th is the day in 1894 that Coxey\'s Army reaches Washington, D.C. to protest the unemployment caused by the Panic of 1893.
2020 is the year that the Large Hadron Collider will be substantially upgraded.
April 30th is the day in 1894 that Coxey\'s Army reaches Washington, D.C. to protest the unemployment caused by the Panic of 1893.
